::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
spotify_all <- read_csv('https://bcdanl.github.io/data/spotify_all.csv')
```
:::






# Q1a

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
top_songs <- spotify_all %>%
  group_by(artist_name, track_name) %>%
  summarize(popularity = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(popularity)) %>%
  head(10)
top_songs
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 10 × 3
# Groups:   artist_name [10]
   artist_name      track_name                          popularity
   <chr>            <chr>                                    <int>
 1 Drake            One Dance                                  143
 2 Kendrick Lamar   HUMBLE.                                    142
 3 The Chainsmokers Closer                                     129
 4 DRAM             Broccoli (feat. Lil Yachty)                127
 5 Post Malone      Congratulations                            119
 6 Migos            Bad and Boujee (feat. Lil Uzi Vert)        117
 7 KYLE             iSpy (feat. Lil Yachty)                    115
 8 Lil Uzi Vert     XO TOUR Llif3                              113
 9 Aminé            Caroline                                   107
10 Khalid           Location                                   102
```
:::
:::


# Q1b

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
top_artists <- spotify_all %>%
  group_by(artist_name) %>%
  summarize(popularity = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(popularity)) %>%
  head(5)
top_artists
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 5 × 2
  artist_name    popularity
  <chr>               <int>
1 Drake                2715
2 Kanye West           1065
3 Kendrick Lamar       1035
4 Rihanna               915
5 The Weeknd            913
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
most_popular_songs <- spotify_all %>%
  filter(artist_name %in% top_artists$artist_name) %>%
  group_by(artist_name, track_name) %>%
  summarize(popularity = n()) %>%
  arrange(artist_name, desc(popularity)) %>%
  group_by(artist_name) %>%
  slice(1)
most_popular_songs
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 5 × 3
# Groups:   artist_name [5]
  artist_name    track_name  popularity
  <chr>          <chr>            <int>
1 Drake          One Dance          143
2 Kanye West     Gold Digger         83
3 Kendrick Lamar HUMBLE.            142
4 Rihanna        Needed Me           79
5 The Weeknd     Starboy            100
```
:::
:::



# Q1c

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(top_songs, aes(x = artist_name, y = popularity, fill = artist_name)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(title = "Popularity of the Ten Most Popular Artists",
       x = "Artist Name", y = "Popularity") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Spotify_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Q1d

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pid_artist_df <- spotify_all %>% 
  group_by(pid, playlist_name, artist_name) %>% 
  summarise(n_artist = n_distinct(artist_name))
```
:::
